title: Immortal Baker of the Spirit Peak: Dusting the Golden Croissants
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, 9:16 vertical orientation, Fantasy Xianxia style, A beautiful, serene Xianxia immortal maiden (cultivator), wearing intricate, flowing pink and white Hanfu robes, gracefully dusting a batch of golden croissants with sparkling powdered sugar using a round sieve. The setting is a magical Spirit Peak landscape, featuring towering misty mountains, ancient bonsai trees with pink cherry blossoms, and a shimmering waterfall flowing golden liquid (honey or elixir) in the background.
